name: Meryem Hajli
summary: Trailblazing Mechanical Technician at Cummins Morocco
description: Meryem Hajli's fascination with machinery and gears from a young age propelled her into the world of mechanical engineering. She broke gender barriers by becoming one of the first female technicians at Cummins Morocco, a company renowned for its engines and power systems. Her journey exemplifies determination and resilience in a traditionally male-dominated field.
